document.full_text: the personal records of some 3.5 million texans were inadvertently exposed after they were placed on a state computer server that was accessible to the public for about a year, state officials said on monday.
document.title: private records of 3.5 million people exposed by texas
lines_and_colors: the personal records of some 3.5 million texans were inadvertently exposed after they were placed on a state computer server that was accessible to the public for about a year, state officials said on monday.
